question:
####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 21](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Council_of_the_Crest_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs]
If the trace on No One Home is unsuccessful, can the Runner choose to avoid/prevent fewer than the total incoming tags/damage?
answer:
Yes.

When a [Snare!](/en/card/20098) resolves, when does the Runner have to choose between preventing the net damage or avoiding the tag with No One Home?
